meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Years old</kanji> in <kanji>month</kanji>s shows <vocabulary>time</vocabulary> in <vocabulary>years</vocabulary>. Just imagine counting time by months and years... You kind of do anyways, right? How old are you? 5 years old. Or, 5 and a half years old (that's five years six months). So, it makes some sense.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
